item.description:
I will make my "Almost World Famous Vegan Chili" and even share my secret recipe with you if you will bring a Vegan Dish to share!

Please BYOB.

Hope to see you at the Potluck and feel free to contact me at 401-573-8912 or through this site if you need any additional information.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: New Year's Eve Vegan Potluck
